### [**Disciplines**]{.smallcaps}

Aging, Biostatistics; Epidemiology; Biomedical Data Science

### [**Research Interest**]{.smallcaps}

-   ***Aging-related Diseases:*** Cognitive decline; Dementia; Cardiovascular disease

-   ***Research Methods:*** Functional data analysis; Machine Learning; Causal inference

-   ***High Dimensional Data:*** Accelerator data; Multi-Omics
